nodes.text: The "Five Fire Rings of Fornax" were the subject of a phrase spoken by Rebel Lieutenant Valeria when she discovered Kordi and Zander Freemaker attempting to depart from the Home One with the Arrowhead. It shared its name with the astronomical location Fornax.

The Five Fire Rings of Fornax were first mentioned in "Escape from Coruscant," a 2017 episode of the animated television series LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the Fire Rings of Fornax were first mentioned in the novelization of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
